review_text: Well engineered, inexpensive, SAFE, does the job.  What more can you say?  Replaced an old Presto pressure cooker that served over 30 years before the handle broke.  I expect comparable lifespan for this one.  Steer clear of the cheap Mantra pressure cookers sold in Target.  Those ones are dangerous and are not UL approved!
summary: The best pressure cooker for the money.
